PersonalStatement.text: Tracy Wright, born on 1972-11-06, is a Male based in Evanshaven, Sierra Leone. He is Single and holds Kenyan nationality. Currently working at Ellison, Anderson and Anderson.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Munoz-Decker from 2006 to 2020.
Senior Marketing Specialist at Ellison, Anderson and Anderson, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Tokyo Institute of Technology (Tokyo Tech)
Master's in Engineering from Siksha 'O' Anusandhan (Deemed to be University)

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys reading.
